sentences.sContent: Living together as a prelude to marriage is now considered acceptable in many countries.
sentences.sCn: 婚前同居如今在许多国家都已被接受。

remMethod.val: pre(在…之前) + lud(表演) + e → 表演之前 → 序幕， 前奏

trans.tranOther: if an event is a prelude to a more important event, it happens just before it and makes people expect it
